name: Hell's Chicken
description: Lucifer, the most resplendent of the angels, because of his pride tried to rebel against the heavenly host but was thrown into the abyss for having dared to rise above God. In his fall he managed to grab an unfortunate chicken that he took with him to the underworld. Exiled to Hades, his only hope of being freed was the chicken, free to move without doubting suspicions, so he took possession of him giving him his powers to be able to succeed in the enterprise. Will he make it to heaven and overthrow the ruler?
